snippet: The withdrawals compounded an already bleak picture for the series, which lacks a title sponsor and is to lose its most successful driver in 2013.
abstract: The withdrawals compounded an already bleak picture for the series, which lacks a title sponsor and is to lose its most successful driver in 2013.

headline.main: With Exits by Ford and Mini, World Rally Championship Struggles
